text: hi team, can you share the HubSpot listener tag for forms? and the trigger?

Hello! Im not sure if this is the correct channel for this but I am having an issue with some embedded forms on our site. For some reason, seemingly out of nowhere, the forms started to disappear when they were submitted with no value.

See the code for rendering the form: <https://gist.github.com/santiaday/a21dc3a91085eb0c69ddb2ee5b5e1db8>

Does anyone have any idea why this could be happening? I am also getting these console errors when submitting the empty form (see screenshot). I reached out to support and they said that our GTM scripts may be interfering, but i ran it without no third party scripts or anything and the error persisted.

Any ideas of what else I can check for debugging? Thank you!!!
You can see some of the options here: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options#:~:text=Configuration%20options>
